LANDING_PAGE_ANNOUNCEMENT_TEXT: Introducing BlockchainScout: Your Gateway to the Latest Blockchain Insights
LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Discover the Future of Blockchain, Today
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Stay ahead of the curve with real-time updates on emerging blockchain technologies, projects, and trends. BlockchainScout helps you navigate the ever-evolving world of distributed ledger technology.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Stay ahead with real-time blockchain insights and updates
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Stay ahead with instant notifications on the latest blockchain developments and emerging trends.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Access information on a wide range of blockchains, cryptocurrencies, and decentralized projects all in one place.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Easily navigate through complex blockchain data with our intuitive and customizable dashboard.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Stay ahead with instant notifications on new blockchain developments, projects, and technologies as they emerge.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Explore our extensive library of blockchain projects, complete with detailed analyses and user reviews.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Receive tailored recommendations based on your interests and browsing history in the blockchain space.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Access in-depth articles and reports from leading blockchain experts and industry insiders.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Enhance your blockchain knowledge with our interactive tutorials, quizzes, and educational resources.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Engage with a vibrant community of blockchain enthusiasts, share discoveries, and participate in discussions.

CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get in touch to discover how our app can revolutionize your blockchain knowledge
SIGN_UP_COMPONENT_LOGIN_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Log In to Your Discovery Portal
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common queries about our blockchain discovery app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What is this blockchain discovery app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app is a cutting-edge tool designed to help users find and explore new blockchain projects, cryptocurrencies, and decentralized applications (dApps) across various networks.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How does the app find new blockchain information?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We use advanced algorithms and real-time data aggregation to scan multiple blockchain networks, crypto exchanges, and news sources. This ensures you're always up-to-date with the latest blockchain innovations and opportunities.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Is this app suitable for beginners in the blockchain space?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely! Our app is designed with both novices and experts in mind. We provide user-friendly interfaces and educational resources to help beginners understand and navigate the blockchain ecosystem.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Can I customize the type of blockchain information I receive?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, you can tailor your experience by setting preferences for specific blockchain networks, project types, or investment criteria. This ensures you only see the most relevant information for your interests.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: How often is the blockchain information updated?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Our app continuously updates in real-time, ensuring you have access to the most current blockchain data, market trends, and project launches as soon as they become available.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What is this blockchain information finder app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app is a cutting-edge tool designed to help you discover and explore the latest blockchain information quickly and efficiently. It aggregates data from multiple sources to provide you with up-to-date insights on various blockchain networks, projects, and trends.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How does the app find new blockchain information?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: The app utilizes advanced algorithms and APIs to scan multiple blockchain networks, news sources, and social media platforms in real-time. It then filters and categorizes the information, presenting you with the most relevant and recent blockchain updates tailored to your interests.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I customize the type of blockchain information I receive?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! Our app allows you to set preferences for specific blockchain networks, projects, or topics you're interested in. You can also adjust the frequency of updates and choose between different information categories such as market data, technical developments, or regulatory news.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is the blockchain information provided by the app reliable?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: We prioritize the accuracy and reliability of the information we provide. Our app sources data from reputable blockchain explorers, verified news outlets, and official project channels. However, we always encourage users to verify critical information independently before making any decisions based on the app's findings.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: © 2023 BlockchainInsight. Discover, analyze, and stay ahead with the latest blockchain information.

TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a blockchain developer, staying updated is crucial. This app has become my go-to source for the latest industry trends and innovations.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: BlockchainInsight's AI-powered notifications have helped me spot investment opportunities I would have otherwise missed. It's a game-changer!
